nickname.maxLength: Nickname must be no more than 14 characters long
nickname.invalidSymbols: Nickname may contain only latin letters, digits and special symbols ".@_"

email.maxLength: Email must be no more than 100 characters long
email.invalidSymbols: Email may contain only latin letters, digits and special symbols ".@_"

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.maxLength: Password must be no more than 20 characters long
password.invalidPassword: Password must contain at least 1 letter and 1 number

about.maxLength: About must be no more than 140 characters long
about.invalidSymbols: About may contain only latin letters, digits and special symbols

profile.passwordDescription: Your account doesn't need password since you sign in via Google / Yandex.
profile.emailNotifications: Allow email notifications for favourite projects

deleteAccount.modalHeader: Do you really want to delete account?
deleteAccount.modalDescription: Deleting your account will result in the irreversible loss of all your data, including projects, teams and personal information. After deletion data recovery will be impossible.
